scripts.deploy-studio: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio -l v0.0.18 l2-base
scripts.deploy: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --product hosted-service harvestfi/harvest-finance-base
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 harvest-graph -l v0.0.1
